## rclone mkdir

Make the path if it doesn't already exist.

### Synopsis

Make the path if it doesn't already exist.

```
rclone mkdir remote:path [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for mkdir
```

See the [global flags page](/flags/) for global options not listed here.
